scripts.upload-staging: gsutil -m -h Cache-Control:"Cache-Control:private, max-age=0, no-transform" cp -r www/* gs://staging.dicekeys.com/
scripts.upload-preview: gsutil -m -h Cache-Control:"Cache-Control:private, max-age=0, no-transform" cp -r www/* gs://preview.dicekeys.com/
scripts.upload-public: gsutil -m -h Cache-Control:"Cache-Control:private, max-age=0, no-transform" cp -r www/* gs://dicekeys.com/
